projects.name: CI-CD pipeline for Java based Application
projects.description: This project focused on developing CI and CD pipeline for Java Based Application using tools like Jenkins, maven, Sonarqube, Docker, Kubernetes and Followed by GitOps with ArgoCd approach for deployment.

projects.name: CI over AWS Cloud
projects.description: Implemented Continuous Integration Pipeline using AWS code commit and code build services.

projects.name: Containerization Of Django based Application
projects.description: This Project was used for containerizing the Django application using Docker as Container run time engine and using Redhat linux as Host OS.

projects.name: Python AWS resource validator
projects.description: Managed AWS resources through Lambda functions for compliance, security, and cost efficiency using Python as language for lambda handler function.

projects.name: Docker Webapp
projects.description: Created the webapp which runs basic docker commands like docker ps, docker images, docker run etc. the webapp used python as backend language and html, css as frontend.

experiences.role_name: Specialization In Container Program CKA AND CKAD
experiences.description: Application Deployment: Designing, Deploying and Managing k8s cluster. Configuration Management: Config Maps, Secrets and Environment variables. Monitoring And Troubleshooting: Integration of Monitoring and Logging Solutions. K8s Security and Maintenance. Creation of Certificates, TLS authentication, monitoring and auditing.
Tasks: Setting up of an httpd web server on amazon Linux VM and Configuring VPC for an application. Impact: Course provided the knowledge on basic services used in AWS Cloud.

full_output.name: Anuj Ramola
achievements_and_awards: Awarded as the Best Allrounder and Most Valuable Player of the biggest Cricket Tournament of college consecutively for two Acharya Premiere League (Apl) Seasons i.e. season 8 and season 9. The bidding to select the players takes place among 15k students.
Captained the team to victory in APL-8 and to runners-up in APL-9, consequently securing the prize of 1 lakh rupees and 70k respectively.
